item.title: How would i run this?
item.dc:creator: @DragonGuild DragonGuild
item.description:
@DragonGuild wrote:

import flash.filters.GlowFilter;
var color:Number = 0x33CCFF;
var alpha:Number = .8;
var blurX:Number = 35;
var blurY:Number = 35;
var strength:Number = 2;
var quality:Number = 3;
var inner:Boolean = false;
var knockout:Boolean = false;
var my_glow_filter:GlowFilter = new GlowFilter(color, alpha, blurX, blurY, strength, quality, inner, knockout);
createEmptyMovieClip(“terrain”, 1);
terrain.lineStyle(20, 0xdd00dd, 100);
terrain.filters = new Array(my_glow_filter);
imdrawing = false;
onMouseDown = function () {
if (imdrawing == false) {
terrain.moveTo(_xmouse, _ymouse);
imdrawing = true;
}
if (imdrawing == true) {
onEnterFrame = function () {
terrain.lineTo(_xmouse, _ymouse);
};
}
};
onMouseUp = function () {
onEnterFrame = function () {
imdrawing = false;
};
};

Read full topic
